name: Chamy - Color by Number
description:
Follow the numbers and dive into a coloring meditation! Color with Chamy - a brand new app from the makers of Pixel Art! Enjoy the harmony of coloring!

Features:

• Tons of stunning pictures. Explore daily updated art collection;
• Great variety of amazing artworks: Mandalas, Animals, Birds, Flowers, Places, Food and many others;
• Easy to paint. Try intuitive design and smooth performance of Chamy;
• Daily free picture. Don't miss a new image every day;
• Helpful booster. Use Hint to find the missing cell if you are stuck;
• Quick sharing. Share your works with friends on social networks or email in just one tap.

Color by number - find your Zen!

Chamy Premium
